subject: RE: App Issue | Eugene PD
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Thank you for the additional information so looking at the account using the mobile app to search the image would require you to have freeform search, which is an upgrade to your account that is currently not enabled. You would need to speak with your admin and your TSM to have them add this to your account as there is an additional charge.
 
Stay safe,
Rob C.
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: DEWITT Derek A [ddewitt@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/22/2025, 3:34 PM
To: support@flocksafety.com
Cc: gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com
Subject: RE: App Issue | Eugene PD



I searched the Flock Safety app using the license plate (from the photo), 7 days and Statewide, and receive a bunch of hits.  I then removed the license plate and upload the photo and I get that response using the same parameters.


Derek

 

Detective D. DeWitt

Financial Crimes Unit

Special Weapons and Tactics Team

Background Investigations Team

Eugene Police Department

300 County Club Road

Eugene, OR 97401

Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

Work Cell � 541-743-6192

 



 

From: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, May 22, 2025 12:28 PM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com
Subject: RE: App Issue | Eugene PD

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Derek,

 

Thanks for reaching out and providing the additional details. When uploading an image it's going to search the database for hits and if this vehicle wasn't flagged or showed up on a camera recently it will not return any results to the search. Had this vehicle passed a camera or put on a list prior to taking the image?

 

Stay safe,

Rob C.

 

 

--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: DEWITT Derek A [ddewitt@eugene-or.gov]
Sent: 5/20/2025, 5:53 PM
To: gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com ; support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com 
Subject: RE: App Issue | Eugene PD

This is prior to clicking the search button.  Its not detecting the plate so its unable to upload the image to even search against anything.

 

Derek

 

Detective D. DeWitt

Financial Crimes Unit

Special Weapons and Tactics Team

Background Investigations Team

Eugene Police Department

300 County Club Road

Eugene, OR 97401

Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

Work Cell � 541-743-6192

 



 

From: Gaby Mahoney <gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com gaby.mahoney@flocksafety.com > 
Sent: Tuesday, May 20, 2025 2:50 PM
To: Flock Safety Support <support@flocksafety.com support@flocksafety.com >
Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: App Issue | Eugene PD

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

 

Hi @Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com  

 

Eugene PD said they are having some issues with taking a photo in the app and it isn't registering the license plate when taking a photo with the camera icon (photo attached). 

 

@DEWITT Derek A ddewitt@eugene-or.gov   can you confirm this vehicle drove past a Flock camera along with making sure you modified the "timeframe" for when it could have (under vehicle fingerprint on the search tab - example: 24 hours, 7 days, etc)? Just so our team has has much information as possible.

 

Thank you,

Gaby 

 

 



 

 

-- 

	
Gaby Mahoney
Customer Success Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com
